com.fxgraph.edges

Class SimpleEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.edges.AbstractEdge
      • com.fxgraph.edges.SimpleEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEdge, IGraphNode

    public class SimpleEdge
extends AbstractEdge
    A straight, diagonal edge connecting two cells in a graph. It can be directed. It does not have a text/label for displaying text.
    Since:
    17 August 2021
    Author:
    ogallagher

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SimpleEdge.SimpleEdgeGraphic
      Graphic to represent a SimpleEdge in a graph canvas.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
      Returns true if other is an IEdge instance, and if the start and end cells of this edge and the other are equal, or if neither are directed and the start and end cells are swapped.
      javafx.scene.layout.Region getGraphic(Graph graph)
      Get the graphic that will represent the graph node when displayed.
      protected void linkCells()
      Does nothing, preventing default AbstractEdge.linkCells() behavior.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
